Address.label: Address
Address.value: 40 WANTAGE AVENUE, BRANCHVILLE, New Jersey, 07890, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Selective Insurance Group Inc is a regional property-casualty insurer based in New Jersey with its operations focused in the New York metropolitan area. Since 1977 Selective has focused its sales efforts on small businesses offering commercial products that include workers compensation general liability property and auto insurance. Selective also has a small personal insurance segment under 20% of total premiums selling auto and homeowners coverage.
